verbose_text: Compared with the control group, the infarct size, cardiomyocyte apoptosis and serum LDH levels significantly increased in the DM group (all P < 0.05) (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), whereas the EGCG administration significantly decreased the infarct size (XREF_FIG), cardiomyocyte apoptosis (XREF_FIG) and serum LDH levels (XREF_FIG) by 17.8, 22.7 and 27.7%, respectively (all P < 0.05).
